name: High-Altitude Lemon Cake
author: sydd
summary: This high-altitude lemon cake is delicious with fresh strawberry frosting. (I use Paula Deen's recipe for that!)
ingredients: ¾ cup butter, at room temperature
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Grease and flour two 9-inch round cake pans
Mix together cake flour, lemon zest, baking powder, and salt
Beat egg whites in a glass, metal, or ceramic bowl until foamy
Gradually add 1/3 cup sugar, continuing to beat until soft peaks form
Cream butter and 1 cup sugar in a large bowl with an electric mixer
Add the flour mixture in batches, alternating with milk and lemon juice, beating batter briefly after each addition
Add lemon extract and egg whites; beat to incorporate into batter
Pour into the prepared cake pans
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 30 minutes
Let cool completely on wire racks before frosting
